name: Hierarchical Paragraph Vectors

# Hierarchical Paragraph Vectors

Download the thesis [here](https://github.com/lukaselmer/hierarchical-paragraph-vectors/raw/master/20150908_master-thesis_hierarchical-paragraph-vectors_lukas-elmer.pdf).

## Code

See [here](https://github.com/lukaselmer/hierarchical-paragraph-vectors/blob/master/code/README.md) how to run the code.

## Slides

See the [Google Presentation](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1VLyvD0OCFqON72qAqm73AerDsJ4TvYh3tZLRQcvdEpc/edit?usp=sharing) or the [PDF Presentation](https://github.com/lukaselmer/hierarchical-paragraph-vectors/raw/master/20150921_final-presentation.pdf).

## Author

Lukas Elmer (@lukaselmer), 2015.
